FuncDef: The display segment-routing bfd tunnel session command displays BFD session information about Segment Routing tunnels.
CLIs: display segment-routing bfd tunnel session [ prefix <ip-address> { <mask> | <mask-length> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays BFD session information about the Segment Routing tunnel with a specified prefix.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the IP address mask.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the length of the IP address mask.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 32.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display segment-routing bfd tunnel session prefix 10.2.2.2 32
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After BFD is configured for SR tunnels, run the display segment-routing bfd tunnel session command to view information about BFD sessions that monitor the tunnels.
If the prefix ip-address parameter is configured, information about a BFD session monitoring a Segment Routing tunnel with a specified destination IP address is displayed. If this parameter is not configured, information about all BFD sessions that monitor Segment Routing tunnels is displayed.
